explanation: Funds are required to be realigned within the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation,

Funds are available within the Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, 21/22, appropriation from PE 0604804A (Logistics and Engineer Equipment - Eng Dev) and will be realigned to PE 0604604A (Medium Tactical Vehicles) for the proper execution of an FY 2021 congressional increase for vehicle health monitoring usage system for proper execution. This is a congressional special interest item. This is base budget funding.
